short_description: golden apple weddings is an event planner services company based in municipal unit of rhodes, greece.
long_description: besides planning your destination wedding in greece, golden apple weddings can also arrange many other event-related services. managing your guest list has never been easier. a welcome party is typically set up as a cocktail party or a bbq. our experience team will take on the whole planning from cocktail party proposal, venue scouting, dj, to hiring a bar and catering service. we as your wedding planners are experts in hosting this event. we organize, curate and are heart-focused communicators that will tell your story with a team you trust. since there plenty inspiration to create an intimate celebration, as your guardians, we will draw out your values and seamlessly execute a celebration around those pillars. golden apple weddings services are tailored to every couple's vision. we provide complete support on planning and coordinating your event, finding the venue, concept creation, supplier research as well as the creative side that consists of the styling and flower decor. we offer all the services you need to capture this chapter of your lives.

generated_description: golden apple weddings is a full-service destination wedding planning and styling firm based in greece. founded by katerina ageliniou, the company specializes in organizing and coordinating weddings, vow renewals, bachelor and bachelorette parties, and other special events. with over eight years of experience, golden apple weddings has created memorable events for more than 200 couples from around the world. the firm is known for its meticulous planning, attention to detail, and personalized approach, ensuring that each event is unique and tailored to the couple's vision.
